name: Montego Bay Tour Highlight
description: You may just in for the day on a cruise ship or stay in one of how were fine hotels here in Jamaica for a week and would like to know apart of Jamaica this tour will do just that for you, Tour Description: This tour contains sight seen in the mountainside for an hour see the coffee plantation, tour on a small farm with banana and then the Montego Bay surrounding area, and other places. Like the Richman Hill Great House which is over 200 years old for an overlook of Montego Bay. This will give you a 360 degree angle look of the town. We will then go on to the hip strip were you can Shopping, Beach or go to Margaritaville.
